testCase.name: initializes with token from localStorage
ListMovies Component renders movies correctly
ListMovies Component filters movies based on language
ListMovies Component navigates when a movie is clicked
ListMovies Component displays no movies found when list is empty
Footer Component should render footer sections correctly
Footer Component should navigate to '/home' when Home is clicked
Footer Component should navigate to '/movies' when Movies is clicked
Footer Component should not navigate when clicking on Events and Profile (since they have no navigation)
Home Component renders Header, Footer, ListMovies, and SlideShow components
Home Component displays the welcome message with the username from localStorage
Home Component has a link to see all movies
Header Component should render logo, navigation links, search bar, and logout button
Header Component should call navigate on logout button click
ViewMovieDeatiles Component renders movie details correctly
ViewMovieDeatiles Component displays error when API call fails
SearchBar Component renders input field correctly
SearchBar Component fetches and displays search results
SearchBar Component navigates to movie details when a suggestion is clicked
SearchBar Component clears suggestions when input is empty
Signup Route renders component on route
SlideShow Component renders slideshow with initial image
SlideShow Component automatically changes slides every 3 seconds
SlideShow Component navigates to the previous slide when prev button is clicked
SlideShow Component navigates to the next slide when next button is clicked
